name: Roblox In The 80s (Prototype)
description:
This is a game where you can expirience Roblox, BUT IN THE 80S!!! This game was made by .bat Games Studios!

This game is inspired by Squirell Monkey's "Roblox in 1988" Video!

NOTE: THIS PROGRAM DOES NOT COLLECT YOUR ROBLOX INFO! YOU CAN CREATE A FAKE USERNAME AND PASSWORD!!!
